title: Rodeo Labs Spork 3.3 Comes in a Straight Steerer Option
content:
Got a bike with a straight steerer and are looking for a more versatile carbon fork for it? Check out the new Rodeo Labs Spork 3.3 option ($325 â€“ $465). It features a straight steerer (or a tapered steerer), 48mm offset, all the cargo bosses you could ever want, either through axle or QR hubs. The finish is flat black with a grey waterslide transfer Spork logo. Buy it in black or shown here in paint to order orange and white.

Check out more at Rodeo Labs and thanks to Rodeo Labs for helping keep those older frames rollin!
